Package jade.core.persistence

Interface Summary
PersistenceHelper The vertical interface for the JADE kernel-level service managing saving and retrieving agents and containers to persistent storage.
PersistenceSlice The horizontal interface for the JADE kernel-level service managing saving and retrieving agents and containers to persistent storage.
Savable This interface provides callback methods that will be invoked during saving, loading, reloading, freezing and thawing operations of an agent that had previously registered this Savable object to the agent's Persistence Helper.
 

Class Summary
FrozenAgent This class represents the persisted state of a frozen JADE agent.
FrozenMessageQueue This class represents the persistent message queue of a frozen JADE agent.
PersistenceManagementBehaviour This behaviour serves the actions of the persistent management ontology supported by the AMS.
PersistenceManager The store/retrieve engine used to manage saving and retrieving agents and containers to persistent storage, using Hibernate.
PersistenceProxy The remote proxy for the JADE kernel-level service managing saving and retrieving agents and containers to persistent storage.
PersistenceService The JADE service to manage saving and retrieving agents and containers to persistent storage.
Repository This class describes a data repository of the JADE Persistence Service.
Repository.ExternalProperties  
Repository.Properties This interface models the configuration properties of a specific repository (such as the kind of specific DBMS and its actual location).
Repository.StoredProperties  
SavedACLMessage This class represents the persisted state of a JADE ACL message.
SavedAgent This class represents the persisted state of a JADE agent.
SavedContainer This class represents the persisted state of a JADE agent container.
